meanings.definition: The system of assigning numerical value to a word or phrase in the belief that words or phrases with identical numerical values bear some relation to each other or bear some relation to the number itself.
meanings.sent1: In gematria, each letter has a specific number value assigned to it.
meanings.sent2: Some ancient texts use gematria to uncover hidden meanings in words.
meanings.sent3: The students giggled when they discovered that gematria turned their names into numbers.
meanings.sent4: The concept of gematria can be like solving a puzzle with numbers instead of pieces.
meanings.sent5: Gematria makes language feel like a secret code waiting to be cracked.
